jei.bonsaitrees4.bonsais.title: Bonsai Trees
jei.bonsaitrees4.soiltypes.title: Bonsai Soils
commands.bonsaitrees4.generate.model.flo: The model contains too many blocks. The maximum is %d.
The model contains too many block states. The maximum is %d.
bonsaitrees4.tooltip.no_valid_soils: No valid soils for this sapling
bonsaitrees4.tooltip.no_valid_saplings: No valid bonsais for this soil
bonsaitrees4.tooltip.enchantment_hint: Enchant the pot to improve its performance.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.title: Bonsai Configuration
bonsaitrees4.configuration.debug.tooltip: Options related to treebugging and treevelopment.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.debug.show_ch: These are chances estimated from the loot tables and are not reliable. There are many factors that can affect the actual chances, which are not taken into account.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.debug.show_un: This can help identify issues with loot tables.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.gameplay.tool: Options related to gameplay, balance and features.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.gameplay.base: If a bonsai tree does not have a custom grow time, this value will be used.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.gameplay.cutC: Mainly to prevent server overload from spamming the cutting action if the output is full. The cooldown in ticks before the server tries to cut the bonsai again.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.gameplay.tool: Every time a bonsai is cut there is a chance that the tool used will take this amount of damage.
The chance that the tool will take damage when cutting a bonsai.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.client.toolti: Options related to rendering and information display.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.client.minima: When enabled, only the hull quads of the bonsai pot will be rendered. This can help with performance on very low end machines.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.client.disabl: When enabled, the model cache will be disabled. This is useful for development and debugging, but causes significant performance impact even on high end machines.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.client.show_j: Showing all the bonsais at the same time might be overwhelming for low end machines. It also clutters the JEI ingredient list.
bonsaitrees4.configuration.client.show_t: When enabled, the tree will be rendered in the tooltip of sapling items.
bonsaitrees4.redstone_mode.stop_on_power: Prevent running with a nearby redstone signal
bonsaitrees4.redstone_mode.require_power: Only run with a nearby redstone signal
